title: DESCRIPTION
content: 11.64 oz (329gr.) jar. Equivalent to 30 services per jar.

title: INDICATIONS
content: Combine one (1) tablespoon in the drink or food of your choice once or twice a day. It can be safely added to cold drinks, juices, smoothies, or recipes. Make sure to mix well before consuming

title: COMPONENTS
content: Grass-Fed Hydrolyzed Bovine Collagen Peptides, Hyaluronic Acid (Sodium Hyaluronate), Biotin (d-Biotin), Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid)
